text: Vidya Dharma Pracharini Nepali Samiti() is a Nepali committee in Varanasi, India. Established for Propagation of Sanatan Dharma and for maintenance of Nepali Dharamshala (type of building), religious rest house in Varanasi and helping awarding education to nepali traveling to Vanaras for Education. It also awards and auspices Madan Smarak Samman puraskar. ==See also== *Jagadamba Nepali Dharmashala ==References== Category:Buildings and structures in Varanasi Category:Dharmshalas Category:Organisations based in Varanasi
title: Vidya Dharma Pracharini Nepali Samiti
